descriptionProfile: Author. Photographer. Gardener. Workshop + Secret Supper host. 📔 Cookbook: Adventures in Chicken 📷 Workshops: www.FirstWeEat.co
Author. Photographer. Gardener. Workshop + Secret Supper host. 📔 Cookbook: Adventures in Chicken 📷 Workshops: www.FirstWeEat.co

posts.description: In case you missed it, I've shared a travel guide to Olympic National Park up on the blog! You can hop on over to AdventuresInCooking.com to check it out 🌿🌿💚🌿🌿 #pnwonderland

So excited to share these hibiscus lattes with you on the blog in a couple days! You can see me brewing up another one this morning on my Instagram stories...They're definitely not something you can only have once! 🌺 #myadventuresincooking

The flowers in the garden have been loving all this rain...I can't say the same for myself, however 😭 Trying to get the garden ready outside while being soaked in a downpour isn't much fun! Luckily I warmed up with a bath afterwards yesterday and some wine 👍🏼 P.S. All these wine goodies are up in the mother's day gift guide I put together on the @crateandbarrel blog if you want to take a gander. #cratestyle #adventuresincookingathome

Happy Sunday, friends!! I'm spending the day in the garden installing the drip watering system and helping jeremy finish up our greenhouse, SOOO excited to grow some peppers in there this summer!! 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼 Then I'll probably unwind like I usually do by laying on the sofa, surfing Pinterest, and then reading my bee books. If you want to see what I'm up to, you can find me on Pinterest at Pinterest.com/evakosmasflores and via the link in profile 😆 (it involves lots of pretty food and garden things!) What are *you* up to today? #thehomesteadlife

We're all sold out for our next @oursecretsupper! I can't believe it's only a week away...The team and I are trying up loose ends and getting everything in tip top shape for next Saturday, can't wait to share the supper with you guys afterwards! If you want to be notified when tickets open for the next supper, you can sign up at OurSecretSupper.com/join and by following @oursecretsupper on Instagram! #oursecretsupper #secretsupperpdx

Okay guys, the sun has ACTUALLY come out today here in Portland!!! Can I just take a moment to say YAYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'm going to ignore the fact that the forecast for the next 9 days starting tomorrow is an endless series of sad-looking rainclouds, and am instead going to spend the day outside in the yard and in the city, enjoying every minute of it! You can follow along with my garden and bee-ventures on my Instagram story today! 🐝🌿🐝 #thehomesteadlife

I love hosting online workshops because it lets people who don’t have the means or the time to be able to travel to one of my 5-day workshops still dive into and learn all about photography, styling, food writing, and branding. It’s difficult if you’re a small business owner or a parent to just drop everything and be gone for nearly a week; my parents had a small Greek deli growing up so I understand the responsibility that comes with managing a small business all on your own (which is something I still do today with my photography business). I’m so happy to be able to teach and get to know more people through my online workshops -  teaching is something that brings me so much joy, I love seeing the “aha!” moment in my students’ work when I can tell that they’re really getting a concept, and watching their skills grow from there. My mother was an elementary school teacher, my sister is a kindergarten teacher, and my brother is an elementary school counselor, so teaching is definitely something that deeply and truly resounds with me and who I am. The spaces for my online workshop are going very quickly, if you’re interested in learning more about photography, styling, writing, and blogging, I’d absolutely love to have you in my course! You can read more about the course material via the link in profile and at www.FirstWeEat.co/online-workshop Hope to "see" you there! 😊

Sharing a little Mother's Day gift guide up on the @crateandbarrel blog! There's some baking stuff, some coffee/tea goodies, and some fun entertaining pieces too! You can pop on over to their blog for some really lovely gift ideas for mom ✨ #cratestyle

I'm sharing the recipe for these delicous grapefruit and @vermontcreamery mascarpone pancakes up on the blog today! If you're trying to find something delicious to make for mother's day, I've got you covered 👍🏼You can checkout the recipe at AdventuresInCooking.com #cheesebutterlove
